name: Bengali
description: The Department of Bengali, Jadavpur University commenced its journey in 1956. Since then, it has gradually become a pioneering institution in the study of Bengali language and literature. From the very early days, the department was fortunate to had teachers like Sushil Kumar De, Debipada Bhattacharya, Ajit Kumar Dutta, Suresh Chandra Maitra, Sankha Ghosh, Alokranjan Dasgupta among others. Over the years, the department has produced scholars, writers and intellectuals of repute who have made significant contribution to Bengali academia and literature.
